services.title: Software Development
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M4 6h16v10H4V6zm0-2a2 2 0 00-2 2v10a2 2 0 002 2h5l-1 2v1h8v-1l-1-2h5a2 2 0 002-2V6a2 2 0 00-2-2H4z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M6 8h4v2H6V8zm0 3h6v2H6v-2z' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive software development services from web and mobile apps to custom business solutions.
services.detailedDescription: We deliver end-to-end software development solutions tailored to your business needs. From modern web applications to mobile apps and enterprise software, our team uses cutting-edge technologies to build scalable, secure, and high-performance solutions.

subcategories.title: Website Development
subcategories.description: Modern, responsive websites built with cutting-edge technologies for optimal performance and user experience.

subcategories.title: Mobile App Development
subcategories.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android with seamless user experiences.

subcategories.title: Custom Business Software
subcategories.description: Tailored software solutions designed to meet specific business requirements and workflows.

subcategories.title: SaaS Product Development
subcategories.description: End-to-end SaaS platform development with multi-tenancy, subscription management, and scalability.

subcategories.title: System Integrations
subcategories.description: Seamless integration of disparate systems and third-party services for unified business operations.

subcategories.title: Testing & QA
subcategories.description: Comprehensive testing and quality assurance services to ensure reliable, bug-free software delivery.

services.title: Cybersecurity Solutions
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M6 10V8a6 6 0 1112 0v2h1a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2v-8a2 2 0 012-2h1zm2 0h8V8a4 4 0 00-8 0v2z' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='16' r='2' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive cybersecurity services to protect your digital assets and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.
services.detailedDescription: Our cybersecurity solutions provide comprehensive protection for your digital infrastructure. From data privacy compliance to advanced threat protection, we implement robust security measures to safeguard your business against cyber threats and ensure regulatory compliance.

subcategories.title: Data Privacy Compliance
subcategories.description: Ensure your business meets data privacy regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and other compliance requirements.

subcategories.title: App & Website Security
subcategories.description: Comprehensive security implementation for web applications and mobile apps to prevent vulnerabilities.

subcategories.title: Secure Login & Access Control
subcategories.description: Implement robust authentication and authorization systems to control user access and protect sensitive data.

subcategories.title: Firewall & Device Protection
subcategories.description: Network security solutions including firewall configuration and device protection strategies.

subcategories.title: Security Audits
subcategories.description: Comprehensive security assessments and penetration testing to identify and address vulnerabilities.

services.title: AI & Smart Automation
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M12 2a2 2 0 012 2v1h3a3 3 0 013 3v10a3 3 0 01-3 3H7a3 3 0 01-3-3V8a3 3 0 013-3h3V4a2 2 0 012-2z' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='9' cy='11' r='1' fill='white'/><circle cx='15' cy='11' r='1' fill='white'/><path d='M8 15h8v2H8v-2z' fill='white'/><path d='M12 1v2M6 6l-1.5-1.5M18 6l1.5-1.5' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Cutting-edge AI solutions and intelligent automation to transform your business operations and decision-making.
services.detailedDescription: Our AI and smart automation services leverage machine learning, natural language processing, and advanced analytics to create intelligent solutions that automate complex processes, enhance decision-making, and drive business innovation through data-driven insights.

subcategories.title: AI App Development
subcategories.description: Custom AI-powered applications that leverage machine learning and advanced algorithms for intelligent functionality.

subcategories.title: Business Automation
subcategories.description: Intelligent automation solutions that streamline business processes and reduce manual workload.

subcategories.title: Chatbots & Virtual Assistants
subcategories.description: AI-powered conversational interfaces that provide 24/7 customer support and intelligent interactions.

subcategories.title: Generative AI Tools
subcategories.description: Custom generative AI solutions for content creation, code generation, and creative applications.

subcategories.title: Data Engineering
subcategories.description: Robust data pipelines and infrastructure for collecting, processing, and analyzing large datasets.

subcategories.title: Big Data Analytics
subcategories.description: Advanced analytics and insights from large-scale data processing and machine learning algorithms.

services.title: Cloud & IT Infrastructure
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M7 16a4 4 0 01-.88-7.903A5 5 0 1115.9 6L16 6a5 5 0 011 9.9V16H7z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M9 12l2 2 4-4' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive cloud solutions and IT infrastructure management for scalable, reliable, and secure operations.
services.detailedDescription: Our cloud and IT infrastructure services provide scalable, secure, and cost-effective solutions for modern businesses. From cloud migration to DevOps implementation, we ensure your infrastructure supports growth while maintaining optimal performance and security.

subcategories.title: Cloud Setup & Management
subcategories.description: Complete cloud infrastructure setup and ongoing management for optimal performance and cost efficiency.

subcategories.title: IT Support & Maintenance
subcategories.description: Comprehensive IT support and maintenance services to ensure your systems run smoothly and securely.

subcategories.title: DevOps & Deployment Automation
subcategories.description: Streamlined development and deployment processes with automated CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code.

subcategories.title: Backup & Recovery
subcategories.description: Robust backup and disaster recovery solutions to protect your data and ensure business continuity.

subcategories.title: Blockchain Solutions
subcategories.description: Innovative blockchain implementations for secure, transparent, and decentralized business solutions.

services.title: Database Services
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M4 4h16a2 2 0 012 2v12a2 2 0 01-2 2H4a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M2 8h20M2 12h20M2 16h20' stroke='white' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='6' cy='6' r='1' fill='white'/><circle cx='6' cy='10' r='1' fill='white'/><circle cx='6' cy='14' r='1' fill='white'/><circle cx='6' cy='18' r='1' fill='white'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive database solutions including design, optimization, migration, and reporting for efficient data management.
services.detailedDescription: Our database services provide comprehensive solutions for data storage, management, and analysis. From database design and optimization to migration and reporting, we ensure your data infrastructure supports your business needs with optimal performance and reliability.

subcategories.title: Database Design & Optimization
subcategories.description: Expert database architecture design and performance optimization for scalable and efficient data management.

subcategories.title: Data Migration
subcategories.description: Seamless data migration services between different database systems with minimal downtime and data integrity.

subcategories.title: Dashboards & Reporting
subcategories.description: Interactive dashboards and comprehensive reporting solutions for data visualization and business insights.

subcategories.title: Data Backup & Recovery
subcategories.description: Robust backup strategies and disaster recovery solutions to protect your critical business data.

services.title: Startup Tech Partner & Launch Support
services.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M12 2l3.09 6.26L22 9.27l-5 4.87L18.18 22 12 18.77 5.82 22 7 14.14l-5-4.87 6.91-1.01L12 2z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M8 12l2 2 6-6' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive tech partnership for startups from idea validation to product launch and scaling.
services.detailedDescription: We partner with startups to provide end-to-end technical support from concept to launch. Our services include MVP development, technical leadership, product strategy, and ongoing support to help startups build, launch, and scale their products successfully in competitive markets.

subcategories.title: MVP Development
subcategories.description: Rapid development of Minimum Viable Products to validate your business idea and enter the market quickly.

subcategories.title: Agile Product Development
subcategories.description: Iterative product development using agile methodologies for flexible and responsive product evolution.

subcategories.title: CTO-as-a-Service
subcategories.description: Technical leadership and strategic guidance for startups without a full-time CTO.

subcategories.title: Product Roadmapping
subcategories.description: Strategic product planning and roadmap development to guide your product's evolution and growth.

subcategories.title: Idea Validation & Consulting
subcategories.description: Comprehensive idea validation and strategic consulting to assess market potential and business viability.
